plot: Weather reporter Keiko Nakadai becomes a sensation by flashing her lingerie when on air. Behind the scenes she wages a war with envious and vicious competitors out to bring her down.
title: Weather Report Girl
plot_es: Weather reporter Keiko Nakadai becomes a sensation by flashing her lingerie when on air. Behind the scenes she wages a war with envious and vicious competitors out to bring her down.
plot_en: Weather reporter Keiko Nakadai becomes a sensation by flashing her lingerie when on air. Behind the scenes she wages a war with envious and vicious competitors out to bring her down.
